headline: Is RBC's Downgrade and Dividend News Shifting the Investment Narrative for GE Vernova (GEV)?
summary: GE Vernova (NYSE: GEV) recently declared a US$0.25 per share quarterly dividend for the fourth quarter of 2025 and presented at the Advancing Artificial Intelligence For The Electric Sector Summit in Washington, DC, where its CTO of Applied Grid Innovation addressed industry advancements. Analyst focus has shifted following RBC Capital Markets' downgrade of GE Vernova, citing valuation concerns, slower growth forecasts, and ongoing uncertainty in the wind business segment despite continued...

headline: GE Vernova Inc. (GEV) is Attracting Investor Attention: Here is What You Should Know
summary: GE Vernova (GEV) has received quite a bit of attention from Zacks.com users lately. Therefore, it is wise to be aware of the facts that can impact the stock's prospects.

headline: Caterpillar Emerges as Unlikely AI Winner on Turbine Demand
summary: The iconic American company, known for its yellow excavators and bulldozers, closed September at an all-time high as investors bet AI’s nearly insatiable demand for electricity will fuel orders for one of Caterpillar’s lesser-known products — power-generation turbines.  Then, as the power demands became clear, a boom in shares of utilities and builders of data centers.  Shares of Caterpillar surged 14% in September, the best month since December 2023.
